title: Reconnect
body:
I played a game more then a hpur ago. Still the match ended i gettng the reconnect srceen and i cant do anything. when i reconnecting the gme is crashing.
Help me pls.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body: This appears to be a ghost game issue which can happen if the match can't tell our servers that it ended.  Relogging should fix this up, but everything looks fine now!
